title: The Waterfall Base
review:
This set is awesome! It looks great for display and does lots of stuff for play.

The figures

Player Figures

Steve-Pretty much the same as all other Steve mini-figures, but he has a fishing rod and iron leggings, which is good to get.

Alex-Also very similar to all other Alex mini-figures, but she has gold leggings and scissors representing sheers. Happy to get these.

Hostile Mobs

Zombie-least special figure in the set, same as always, but at least he has a wooden shovel.

Enderman- Great to see in this set. I had not ever gotten one before this set as they are kind of rare. Plus he gets a dirt block to carry

Animals

Cyan Sheep- Great to see another variant of the sheep figure. It can be sheered

Cat-the cat is very cute and cool to see in Lego

Waterfall Base Build

The Outside

The outside terrain looks good as always, but the base itself is very unique in a good way. it looks to be carved out of a mountain and built by the players to use as a house. It has a nice look and color scheme with the white and brown Walls. Surprisingly the base is closed up around the back and looks like the inside of the mountain. The doors on front and back lead very nicely to the inside.

The Inside

The room under the waterfall is small but features a bed, carpet, bookshelf, and flower in a pot.

The big main room has 2 chests, 2 item display cases, 4 cyan wool(or Diamond) blocks and 3 crafting tables. A diamond sword and fish are in the display cases. If everything on the floor is removed the cyan carpet makes the shape of a pickaxe.

The room opposite of the waterfall is open and has the secret lava entrance. It has a furnace and an anvil

The features

the lava entrance is a 4 by 4 section of lava that can be halfway slid over to reveal the stone path

The base transforms completely by hinging open both sides and removing the roof. This brings a totally different look to the thing and increases play dramatically and gives great access to the interior. 

 

This set deserves a 5 out of five for the great transformation features, Great figures, and lovely overall look. And I got it on sale at Walmart. I hope this review was helpful.
